title: Top 10 UK Lottery Winners Revealed After Rs 1800 Crore Jackpot
content: A UK resident recently won 177 million pounds (₹1804 crore) in EuroMillions, becoming the third-largest UK lottery winner. The biggest jackpot was 195 million pounds in 2022.

title: Trump Tariffs Are Latest Inflationary Pressure For US Lumber
content: US lumber prices, which already have risen in recent months due to lower production in Canada, could see further gains after President-elect Donald Trump's proposed tariffs on trade from north of the border.

title: Temple Attacked As Tensions Soar After Hindu Priest's Arrest In Bangladesh

title: Will Trump Overshadow Biden's Success In Sealing Israel-Lebanon Truce Deal?

title: Why "Trump Guitars" Has A "Cease And Desist" Letter From Iconic Brand
